description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
Iver Court, Canonbury Park South, Islington, London, N1 2JP

TPO Reference:
T21– London Plane of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007
T22 & T23– Cherries of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007
T4– Lime of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007

PO Number:
T100026

Work specifications:

1 x London Plane (T21) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 7m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear property by up to 3m

2 x Cherries (T22 & T23) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 2m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear property by up to 3m

1 x Lime (T24) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.324) 2007
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 5m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear property by up to 3m
decision_conditions: The species and works specifications have been ammended from on the original application following discussion with the agent. The London Plane T21 was incorrectly labeled as a Lime and the works specification now include a 15% thin.
